query.sql: SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , call_stack , module , action , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_60_min ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

display.name: Logger logs 5 mins
display.description: Showing all logged events last 5 minutes in descending order
display.tooltip: Showing all logged events last 5 minutes in descending order

query.sql: SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , call_stack , module , action , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_5_min ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

SELECT max(time_stamp) over (partition by scope) - min(time_stamp) over (partition by scope) scope_elapsed , time_stamp , time_stamp - LAG(time_stamp, 1) OVER (ORDER BY time_stamp) elapsed ,case logger_level when 1 then 'PERMANENT' when 2 then 'ERROR' when 4 then 'WARNING' when 8 then 'INFO' when 16 then 'DEBUG' when 32 then 'TIMING' when 64 then 'SYS_CTX' when 128 then 'APEX' else NULL end as level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , module , action , call_stack , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs WHERE (SCOPE = :SCOPE OR :SCOPE IS NULL) --AND TIME_STAMP BETWEEN NVL(CAST(:TIME_STAMP AS DATE) - 1, SYSDATE -1) AND NVL(CAST(:TIME_STAMP AS DATE), SYSDATE) AND TIME_STAMP BETWEEN :TIME_STAMP - 1 AND :TIME_STAMP + 1 --> SYSDATE - 3/24 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

display.name: Logger logs last day
display.description: Showing all logged events last day (24 hours) in descending order
display.tooltip: Showing all logged events last day (24 hours) in descending order

query.sql: SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , module , action , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_day ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , module , action , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_week ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

display.name: Log events pr day last week

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr day last week
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(time_stamp) eventdate, /*to_char(time_stamp, 'day') weekday,*/ level_text, count(*) from logger_logs_1_week group by trunc(time_stamp), /*to_char(time_stamp, 'day'),*/ level_text order by trunc(time_stamp), 2

display.name: Elapsed graph for scope
display.description: Seconds between log-entries in scope This report is broken - makes no sense
display.tooltip: This report is broken - makes no sense

query.sql: WITH base_data AS (SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY time_stamp) rn ,time_stamp ,time_stamp - LAG(time_stamp, 1) OVER(ORDER BY time_stamp) elapsed FROM logger_logs WHERE SCOPE = :SCOPE AND TIME_STAMP BETWEEN :TIME_STAMP - 1 AND :TIME_STAMP + 1 --WHERE scope = 'Auto:917713' --AND time_stamp BETWEEN SYSDATE - 1 AND SYSDATE + 1 ) SELECT 'Logtime' ,CAST(time_stamp AS DATE) log_time --,time_stamp as log_time ,extract(hour FROM elapsed) * 3600 + extract(minute FROM elapsed) * 60 + extract(SECOND FROM elapsed) elapsed FROM base_data ORDER BY time_stamp

display.name: Log events pr hour last day

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr hour last day
CustomValues.SUBTITLE: true
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(time_stamp, 'hh24') hour, level_text, count(*) events_logged from logger_logs_1_day group by trunc(time_stamp, 'hh24'), level_text order by 1, 2

display.name: Log events pr hour last week

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr hour last week
CustomValues.SUBTITLE: true
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(l.time_stamp, 'hh24') hour, l.level_text, count(*) events_logged from logger_logs_1_week l group by trunc(l.time_stamp, 'hh24'), level_text order by 1, 2

display.name: Logged errors last day
display.description: Showing errors logged last day (24 hours) in descending order
display.tooltip: Showing errors logged last day (24 hours) in descending order

query.sql: SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , module , action , call_stack , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_day WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' AND (:UNIT_NAME IS NULL OR UNIT_NAME LIKE :UNIT_NAME) ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

display.name: Log events pr day last month

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr day last month
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(time_stamp) log_date, level_text, count(*) from logger_logs l join logger.logger_levels ll on l.logger_level = ll.logger_level where time_stamp >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -1) group by trunc(time_stamp), level_text order by 1, 2

SELECT sum(count(*)) over () total_occurrences , count(*) occurrences , round(ratio_to_report(count(*)) over ()*100, 1) pct_of_total , unit_name , line_no , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_week WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, LINE_NO ORDER BY 2 DESC, UNIT_NAME

item.title: Errors in this unit, last week

display.name: Logged errors last week
display.description: Showing errors logged last week (7 days) in descending order
display.tooltip: Showing errors logged last week (7 days) in descending order

query.sql: SELECT time_stamp , level_text , text , unit_name , line_no , scope , extra , module , action , call_stack , user_name , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_week WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' AND (:UNIT_NAME IS NULL OR UNIT_NAME LIKE :UNIT_NAME) ORDER BY time_stamp DESC

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr sliding hour last 24 hrs
CustomValues.SUBTITLE: true
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select extract(day from systimestamp-time_stamp) * 24 + extract(hour from systimestamp-time_stamp) hours_ago, level_text, count(*) events_logged from logger_logs_1_day --where time_stamp >= systimestamp - 1 group by extract(day from systimestamp-time_stamp) * 24 + extract(hour from systimestamp-time_stamp), level_text order by 1 desc, 2

SELECT sum(count(*)) over () total_occurrences , count(*) occurrences , round(ratio_to_report(count(*)) over ()*100, 1) pct_of_total , unit_name , line_no , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_day WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' AND time_stamp >= trunc(systimestamp) GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, LINE_NO ORDER BY 2 DESC, UNIT_NAME

SELECT sum(count(*)) over () total_occurrences , count(*) occurrences , round(ratio_to_report(count(*)) over ()*100, 1) pct_of_total , unit_name , line_no , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_week WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' AND time_stamp between trunc(systimestamp)-1 and trunc(systimestamp) GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, LINE_NO ORDER BY 2 DESC, UNIT_NAME

display.name: Log events pr day last year

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr day last year
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(time_stamp) log_date, level_text, count(*) from logger_logs l join logger.logger_levels ll on l.logger_level = ll.logger_level where time_stamp >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -12) group by trunc(time_stamp), level_text order by 1, 2

display.name: Most frequent errors last x hrs

query.sql: SELECT sum(count(*)) over () total_occurrences , count(*) occurrences , round(ratio_to_report(count(*)) over ()*100, 1) pct_of_total , unit_name , line_no , substr(unit_name, 1, instr(unit_name, '.') - 1) sdev_link_owner , regexp_replace(unit_name, '(.*\.)(.*)(\..*)', '\2') sdev_link_name , 'PACKAGE BODY' sdev_link_type FROM logger_logs_1_week WHERE level_text = 'ERROR' AND time_stamp >= systimestamp - nvl(:hours_ago, 6)/24 GROUP BY UNIT_NAME, LINE_NO ORDER BY 2 DESC, UNIT_NAME

display.name: Logged errors pr day last year

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Logged events of type pr day last year
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: select trunc(time_stamp) log_date, level_text, count(*) from logger_logs l join logger.logger_levels ll on l.logger_level = ll.logger_level where time_stamp >= add_months(trunc(sysdate), -12) and l.logger_level IN (2) group by trunc(time_stamp), ll.level_text order by 1, 2
